speaker: Speaker
instructPlaceholder: e.g., very happy, a bit sad...
instructPlaceholderDesign: Using preset guidance from voice design
instructPlaceholderDefault: e.g., gentle and caring, slow pace, full of warmth
advancedOptionsDescription: Adjust generation parameters to control audio quality and generation length
designDescriptionPlaceholder: e.g., Mature male, deep and magnetic, authoritative
saveDesignDescription: Name and save the current voice design for quick future use
clonePrepareFailed: Clone preparation failed, but design saved
fillDesignDescription: Please fill in voice description first

maxNewTokens.label: Max Generation Length
maxNewTokens.description: Controls the maximum length of generated audio. Higher values allow longer audio but increase processing time

temperature.label: Temperature
temperature.description: Controls generation randomness. Higher values produce more varied output, lower values are more stable and consistent

topK.label: Top K
topK.description: Only considers the K most probable candidates during sampling. Smaller values are more deterministic, larger values are more diverse

topP.label: Top P (Nucleus Sampling)
topP.description: Cumulative probability threshold for sampling. Controls output diversity by sampling from candidates with cumulative probability up to P

repetitionPenalty.label: Repetition Penalty
repetitionPenalty.description: Penalizes repetitive content generation. Higher values avoid repetition more, but excessive values may affect naturalness
